alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 6:53AM CDT until March 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 652 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newellton to 10 miles northwest of Lee Bayou, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Newellton and Lake Bruin around 700 AM CDT. St. Joseph around 705 AM CDT. Clayton around 710 AM CDT. Alcorn around 715 AM CDT. Waterproof and Spokane around 720 AM CDT. Port Gibson around 725 AM CDT. Pattison, Church Hill and Hermanville around 735 AM CDT. Stanton around 740 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sicily Island and Ridgecrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
